parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: tread separation from the tire body

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improperly secured loads can cause accidents, injuries, and damage to vehicles and property.
symptoms: Loads shifting or falling off during transportation

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to properly maintain and inspect vehicles can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: failure to address recurring tire failures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fractures and tears in the steel frame supporting the pin box can cause the trailer to separate from the tow vehicle, leading to fatalities and extensive property damage.
symptoms: Fractures and tears in the steel frame
potential separation of the trailer from the tow vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front-end design causes water to fill the headlights, leading to short circuits, and poor road illumination, which can increase the risk of accidents.
The Ricon suspension fleet defect can cause accidents or injuries due to the manufacturer's failure to recall similar failures for repair.
The trailer axles are positioned too far back, causing excessive tongue weight, which can lead to catastrophic failure of the hitch, receiver, or axles, resulting in accidents or injuries.
Warped brake rotors can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: vibrations or noise when applying brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the brake system on trailers can cause loss of control, accidents, or damage to the trailer and surrounding vehicles.
symptoms: Only some of the brakes on the trailer are functioning

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Brake Design on Motorized Scooters
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate brake design on motorized scooters can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities due to the vehicle's instability and lack of safety features.
symptoms: Small tires making the vehicle inherently unstable
lack of DOT-approved tires and brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake issues on RVs can cause accidents, loss of control, or damage to the vehicle and surrounding vehicles.
symptoms: Loud noises or screeching when applying brakes
brake shoes or drums need frequent replacement.
